E. PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy Statement

Fastline Hardware values an individual’s right to privacy. As such, we ensure that all personal and sensitive data we collected and entrusted to us are managed and protected at all times in accordance with Republic Act 10173, otherwise known as the Data Privacy Act. Likewise, we make it a point to inform individuals from whom we collect such data of this policy and to respect and enforce their rights as data subjects. This is in consonance of the principles of corporate responsibility and in recognition of the policy of the state to protect the fundamental human right of privacy while ensuring free flow of information to promote innovation and growth. For this purpose, Fastline Hardware implements all necessary security measures to ensure the protection of an individual’s personal data.

1. This document enumerates Fastline Hardware organizational policy in relation to the collection, use, storage, sharing and disposal of all personal data acquired from customers and visitors who are using our online ordering site and are processed by the organization in accordance with Data Privacy Law, its IRR, and all related issuances of NPC.

2. Fastline Hardware maintains the right to amend and/ or modify this policy to comply with any future changes or development in local/ foreign data privacy regulations where applicable and to reflect the organization’s policies.
3. This online Privacy Policy applies only to information collected through our online ordering site and not to information collected offline.
What Information do we collect and its purpose?

When ordering or registering on our site, respond to a survey or fill out a form, and submit to us to your inquiries or concerns, as appropriate and required we collect, process, use and store any and all personal data necessary for us to perform or fulfill its services to you. Such data may include among others:
a. Personal details such complete name, home address, gender, date of birth, contact number, email-address
b. Credit History
c. Proof of financial capacity
d. Government issued identification
e. Other Relevant Personal and Confidential Information
Should you choose not to provide any or all of the above personal data, Fastline Hardware may not be able to accommodate or perform the required services or respond to your queries and request.

Fastline Hardware collects, processes and uses your personal data to give you better services in processing your orders, payments, deliveries, to accommodate and respond to your inquiries, concerns or request, and to inform you of our products, services, promotions, events, to improve our customer service, to personalize your experience and better respond to your individual needs, and for other legitimate business purposes.
Please be informed at all times, that the information that we collect from you are only those necessary and relevant to our dealings with you and in order to perform the required services.
How do we protect your information?
We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit or access your personal information

Only authorized Fastline Hardware personnel has access to your personal data. Personal data collected via electronic means are stored in a well-maintained database managed by our system expert while physical data are stored in locked filing cabinets with CCTV using the prevailing document and records management policy of the company.

As general rules and in abiding the legal requirement of the law, Fastline Hardware is not allowed to share (disclose, trade, sell or transfer) your personal identifiable information with other third parties or outside parties except if imperative and necessary to perform the services and purposes, and unless with your consent. This, however, does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business or servicing you. Nevertheless, we assure you that we will keep the sharing of information at the minimum or data shared are those only required by them to achieve the purpose, and any data shared with such third parties will be safeguarded by data sharing agreement which includes declaration by the third parties that they agree to keep this information confidential at all times. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law or protect ours or others rights, property or safety.
How to access and correct your Personal Data?

The accuracy and correctness of any personal data provided shall be your responsibility as well as the consequences of your failure to disclose your correct and updated personal data to Fastline Hardware.

In accordance with the Data Privacy Law, as data subject you have the right to access, obtain or ask for a copy of your personal data whether in our computer data base or manual filing system, and whether for purpose of your information or knowledge, or for it to be corrected and/or updated.
The same shall be provided to you in an easy access format, accompanied with full explanation executed in plain language. Should you obtain to obtain information, you may demand the following:
a. The content of your personal data that were processed
b. The sources from which they were obtained
c. Names and addresses of the recipient of your data
d. Manner by which they were processed
e. Reasons for disclosure, if there are any
f. Date when your data was last accessed and modified

To correct and update your personal data you may contact Fastline Hardware customer service inside our stores or contact us or send us a message stating the personal data you wished to access or be corrected and/ or updated. Fastline Hardware shall provide you the data you want to access as well as process the correction and/ or update of your personal data within the time allowed by law and regulations.
In the event that correcting or updating of personal data is not possible due to legal and technical reasons, Fastline Hardware will contact you and explain the reason/s thereof.
How do we retain and dispose your personal data?

It is our policy to ensure that personal data is only retained for a limited period pertinent for the purpose for which they were collected or until the lawful and legitimate purpose of the processing is achieved (e.g. while you are our active customer, etc.). Once the purpose has been achieved or the such personal data is not or no longer necessary for the services or purposes, and/or the retention of which is no longer allowed by law, and it appears that storage of your personal data is no longer necessary, we shall immediately destroy or dispose said information in a secure manner through established procedures for securely disposing files that contain personal data whether the same is stored on paper, film, optical or magnetic media, personal data stored offsite, and computer equipment, such as disk servers, desktop computers and mobile phones through shredding for physical records while digital files shall be anonymized. Once deleted, your personal data will no longer be searchable or accessible and will be completely removed from our database
Your Consent
By using our online ordering site, you consent to our Privacy Policy.
Changes in our Privacy Policy

As stated above, Fastline Hardware reserves the right to change, modify or amend our Policy from time to time. Any change or amendment in our Policy will be posted here and will take effect immediately
Contact us
